Draconius Rex

Master of Fire and Art

Welcome to the realm of Draconius Rex, where ancient wisdom meets modern artistry. For centuries, I have soared through digital landscapes, breathing life into pixels and polygons with the same passion that once forged mountains and carved valleys.

My artistic journey spans both the traditional realms of 2D illustration and the cutting-edge domains of 3D modeling and animation. Each piece tells a story of fire and fantasy, of creatures both fearsome and beautiful.

Explore my galleries below to witness the evolution of draconic art through digital mediums, where every scale is crafted with precision and every flame burns with creative passion.
